abstract: Target and Wal-Mart, trying to beat their online competitor Amazon, continue to lower book prices, albeit as slightly as possible. When one charges $8.99, the other shifts to $8.98. Is $8.97 next?
snippet: Target and Wal-Mart, trying to beat their online competitor Amazon, continue to lower book prices, albeit as slightly as possible. When one charges $8.99, the other shifts to $8.98. Is $8.97 next?
lead_paragraph: It’s the war of the pennies.

headline.main: Book Price Wars Escalate, One Penny at a Time
